attributes.action: I want the scrapping of the school term time fine for parents
attributes.additional_details: Parents are being punished for taking their children away and wanting them to enjoy the best part about being a child and that is learning to understand family & happy times are the most important part of life. They are punished in costs from the airlines and holiday companies. Teachers striking & taking training days also put into question the validity of this fine. Instead rules around the number of events/times children are removed should be implemented for a fine threshold ie 3/4 events.
attributes.background: I want this fine to be abolished completely.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Stop fines for taking children out of school on holiday
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727960
